publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3441 Michael Russell: Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers—That the Parliament agrees that the sale of the Sunday Herald, The Herald and the Evening Times to the Barclay brothers, current owners of Scotland on Sunday, The Scotsman and the Edinburgh Evening News, would be a completely unacceptable concentration of Scottish media ownership and grossly detrimental to the future of a diverse, free and vigorous Scottish media. R
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-3441 Michael Russell: Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers—That the Parliament agrees that the sale of the Sunday Herald, The Herald and the Evening Times to the Barclay brothers, current owners of Scotland on Sunday, The Scotsman and the Edinburgh Evening News, would be a completely unacceptable concentration of Scottish media ownership and grossly detrimental to the future of a diverse, free and vigorous Scottish media. RSupported by: Stewart Stevenson, Christine Grahame, Mr Jamie Stone, Shona Robison*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*R
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Robert Brown*, Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3441 Sale of Scottish Media Group Newspapers (lodged on 30 September 2002) Dennis Canavan*
